provider.description: The SaaS API that we are integrating with.

objects.description: This is a map of object names to their configuration.

objectName.description: The name of the object to read from.

schedule.description: The schedule for reading the object, in cron syntax.

destination.description: The name of the destination that the result should be sent to.

selectedFields.description: This is a map of field names to booleans indicating whether they should be read. If a field is already included in `selectedFieldMappings`, it does not need to be included here.

selectedValueMappings.description: This is a map of field names to their value mappings.

additionalProperties.title: Selected Value Mappings
additionalProperties.description: This is a map of values to their mappings. The key is the value delivered to the webhook, the value is the value coming from the provider API.

selectedFieldMappings.description: This is a map of mapToNames to field names. (A mapTo name is the name the builder wants to map a field to when it lands in their destination.)

selectedFieldsAuto.title: Selected Fields Auto Config
selectedFieldsAuto.description: If selectedFieldsAuto is set to all, all fields will be read.

days.description: Number of days in past to backfill from. 0 is no backfill. e.g) if 10, then backfill last 10 days of data. Required if fullHistory is not set.

fullHistory.description: If true, backfill all history. Required if days is not set.

objects.description: This is a map of object names to their configuration.

objectName.description: The name of the object to write to.

selectedValueDefaults.description: This is a map of field names to default values. These values will be used when writing to the object.

oneOf.title: Value Default String

value.description: The value to be used as a default.

applyOnUpdate.description:
Whether the default value should be applied when updating a record.
If set to `always`, the default value will be applied when updating a record.
If set to `never`, the default value will not be applied when updating a record,
only when creating a record.
If unspecified, then `always` is assumed.

oneOf.title: Value Default Integer

value.description: The value to be used as a default.

applyOnUpdate.description:
Whether the default value should be applied when updating a record.
If set to `always`, the default value will be applied when updating a record.
If set to `never`, the default value will not be applied when updating a record,
only when creating a record.
If unspecified, then `always` is assumed.

oneOf.title: Value Default Boolean

value.description: The value to be used as a default.

applyOnUpdate.description:
Whether the default value should be applied when updating a record.
If set to `always`, the default value will be applied when updating a record.
If set to `never`, the default value will not be applied when updating a record,
only when creating a record.
If unspecified, then `always` is assumed.

selectedFieldSettings.description: This is a map of field names to their settings.

oneOf.title: Default value of type string for a field

value.description: The default string value to apply to a field

writeOnCreate.description: Whether the default value should be applied when creating a record.

writeOnUpdate.description: Whether the default value should be applied when updating a record.

oneOf.title: Default value of type integer for a field

value.description: The default integer value to apply to a field

writeOnCreate.description: Whether the default value should be applied when creating a record.

writeOnUpdate.description: Whether the default value should be applied when updating a record.

oneOf.title: Default value of type boolean for a field

value.description: The default boolean value to apply to a field

writeOnCreate.description: Whether the default value should be applied when creating a record.

writeOnUpdate.description: Whether the default value should be applied when updating a record.

objects.description: This is a map of object names to their configuration.

objectName.description: The name of the object to read from.

schedule.description: The schedule for reading the object, in cron syntax.

destination.description: The name of the destination that the result should be sent to.

selectedFields.description: This is a map of field names to booleans indicating whether they should be read. If a field is already included in `selectedFieldMappings`, it does not need to be included here.

selectedValueMappings.description: This is a map of field names to their value mappings.

additionalProperties.title: Selected Value Mappings
additionalProperties.description: This is a map of values to their mappings. The key is the value delivered to the webhook, the value is the value coming from the provider API.

selectedFieldMappings.description: This is a map of mapToNames to field names. (A mapTo name is the name the builder wants to map a field to when it lands in their destination.)

selectedFieldsAuto.title: Selected Fields Auto Config
selectedFieldsAuto.description: If selectedFieldsAuto is set to all, all fields will be read.

days.description: Number of days in past to backfill from. 0 is no backfill. e.g) if 10, then backfill last 10 days of data. Required if fullHistory is not set.

fullHistory.description: If true, backfill all history. Required if days is not set.

Whether the default value should be applied when updating a record.
If set to `always`, the default value will be applied when updating a record.
If set to `never`, the default value will not be applied when updating a record,
only when creating a record.
If unspecified, then `always` is assumed.

value.description: The value to be used as a default.

applyOnUpdate.description:

only when creating a record.
If unspecified, then `always` is assumed.
